jobsJson.text: Operations Strategy Manager/ Sr Manager - Driver Core
jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Things they will do:
● Research (desk + on the ground) on different apps
● Manage internal projects (eg. testing EV with our pool of driver-partners)

They need to be:
● Relational - be able to reach out to people (mostly internal) and build working relationships with them
● Resourceful - things that they will do has no knowledge base yet, so need to develop and piece together from all over the place
jobsJson.description:
Things they will do:
● Research (desk + on the ground) on different apps
● Manage internal projects (eg. testing EV with our pool of driver-partners)

They need to be:
● Relational - be able to reach out to people (mostly internal) and build working relationships with them
● Resourceful - things that they will do has no knowledge base yet, so need to develop and piece together from all over the place
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Min Bachelor degree from the top university or abroad (preferred MBA)
  • Indonesian (or at least the first language is Indonesian)
  • Preferably have experience in the following industries: Management Consultant, FMCG, Telco, or Investment Company (PE / VC / IB)
  • Strong in strategic, organizing, planning, operations, and project management
  • Very fluent in number, excellent in analyzing data, and using analytics to make decisions
  • Results-driven with strong communication & interpersonal skill
  • Excellent Leadership & Team Building skills
  • Previous experience in managing high-impact project
  • Fast-paced, independent thinker
  • Passionate and knowledgeable about GO-JEK Business overall
  • Fluency in English
